m_szDocSumamry: Pinterest × MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., June 26, 2014 /PRNewswire/ -- Do-it-yourself (DIY) on-board diagnostics (OBD)-II based telematics applications are still in the introductory stage, and currently only have a penetration of 2 percent. This presents vast potential, which, with greater customer awareness, can optimally be tapped. Presently, user-based insurance (UBI) is the most popular service in the North American market, as vehicle owners are keen to attain 'good driver' discounts on insurance premiums.
